Level.tooltip: Federal, state, school district, or city or county government

State/US.tooltip: State where the anti-CRT activity was introduced

Body Name.tooltip: Name of Governing Official, state, or local entity or legislature

Bill #.tooltip: The official number assigned to the proposed or enacted state law

Activity Type.tooltip: Instrument being used to advance anti-CRT activity

Target Institution.tooltip: The type of entity the authority type is attempting to regulate

Conduct Trigger.tooltip: Language used in the anti-CRT activity is derived from the now rescinded Trump Executive Order 13950 to suppress specific acts

options: "Indiv. “discomfort, guilt, anguish, or any other form of psychological distress on account of his or her race”"
Creates a private cause of action

Category.tooltip: Focus of the anti-CRT activity is on race or ethnicity, sex or other category like religion or color
